tool_description: An API showing the latest news about Bitcoin all around the world
name: Bitcoin News
title: Bitcoin News

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source
api_list.description: Gets News about Bitcoin from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoin-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/independent"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoin-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoin-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoin-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Bitcoin News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all latest news about Bitcoin
